overview: Bling Bling, the crack cocaineâ€“addicted star of the infamous "Bumfights" series of films, invites viewers to join him on a bizarre journey into the drama of his life, from outrageous dreamlike sequences to attempts at scoring some rock. Along the way, Bling tangles with the cops, gets jiggy with mannequins and has his manhood pierced. It's a wild ride into the colorful existence of an urban cult icon.
tagline: 3 Days on the Road with a Crackhead
title: Bling Bling: Bling-A-Long
